summary: Mining and energy development companies may be required to reclaim lands that they have disturbed—for example, by removing hazardous materials and replanting the land. These companies may also need to provide financial assurances, such as cash or bonds, to cover reclamation costs. We reviewed the financial assurance requirements for surface coal mining, mineral mining, onshore oil and gas extraction, and wind and solar production and...
title: Financial Assurances for Reclamation: Federal Regulations and Policies for Selected Mining and Energy Development Activities
